text:
Let us pray: 

If Trump dies before I wake, I pray to god the news ain't fake.
author: Cog_Dis

text: So sayeth the man who never balanced a budget and personally owes tens of thousands of dollars in credit card bills.
author: Cog_Dis

text: THIS is why I stayed a union member and paid my dues for 24 years. My wife and I can't thank @AFSCME enough for giving us 7 years of my life back. And @ScottWalker and @ChrisAbeleMKE ,you can both go suck lemons! #wiunion #AFSCMEstrong
author: Cog_Dis

text: Thanks, sweetie. But at least it was easy to keep ourselves motivated.  At the time of his death, we lived in an apartment that did not allow pets.  Two years of work and tens of thousands of dollars in much needed repairs and updates later, we are here:
author: Cog_Dis

text: My dad was a full blown hoarder. When he died, it took us almost two full years to clean out the house, everything from 20 year old food in the freezer to 40 year old shirts still in their wrappers.
author: Cog_Dis

text: That's why you get child protective services involved.  BTW, don't forget, my dad was one of them hoarders.
author: Cog_Dis

text: That is the result of mental illness. It's a CPS matter.  The only ways the legal system should be involved is to order the children detained and maybe order the parent into treatment.
author: Cog_Dis

text: Go to jail for a mental illness? Umm, no.
author: Cog_Dis
